A

account - package account
Provides the classes necessary to manage different types of accounts for a user.
Account - Class in account
Abstract class representing a user's bank account.
Account(int, ATM) - Constructor for class account.Account
Account constructor.
AccountInterface - Class in interfaces
Class representing the account menu that will be displayed in the interface for users to manage their accounts.
AccountInterface(ATM) - Constructor for class interfaces.AccountInterface
Constructor for AccountInterface.
accountInterface - Variable in class interfaces.UserInterface
The account interface that the user interface will be able to access.
AccountManager - Class in bankmanager
Account Manager handles all requests relating to Account delegated from Bank Manager.
AccountManager(ATM) - Constructor for class bankmanager.AccountManager
Account Manager constructor.
accountManager - Variable in class bankmanager.BankManager
Instance of AccountManager
accountNum - Variable in class account.Account
The unique account number.
accountNum - Variable in class atm.Transaction
The number of the account used to perform the transaction.
accounts - Variable in class atm.User
A list of all the accounts a user owns.
acct_counter - Variable in class bankmanager.AccountManager
Keeps track of the last account number assigned to an account to generate unique account numbers.
addBills(int, int) - Method in class atm.Bills
Adds a certain number of a type of bill to the ATM.
addExistingUserToAccount(User, Account) - Method in class bankmanager.AccountManager
Adds an existing user to an existing account that belongs to another user.
addExistingUserToAccount(User, Account) - Method in class bankmanager.BankManager
Turns a sole owner account into a joint account by adding another owner through AccountManager
addInterest() - Method in class account.Savings
Increases Account.balance according to the Savings.interestRate.
addMoney(double) - Method in class account.Account
Adds money to the account and updates the balance according to the type of account.
addMoney(double) - Method in class account.Asset
Adds money to the account and increases the balance.
addMoney(double) - Method in class account.Debt
Adds money to the account and decreases the balance.
addSavingsInterest() - Method in class atm.ATM
Adds the specified interestRate to the balances of all savings account at the beginning of each month.
addSubscription(Subscription) - Method in class atm.User
Adds a Subscription to the user's list of subscriptions
addSubscription(User) - Method in class interfaces.SubscriptionInterface
Allows the user to add a subscription.
addSubscription(String, double) - Method in class subscriptions.AvailableSubscriptions
Makes a new subscription available if not offered already.
addSubscription(User, String) - Method in class subscriptions.Subscriber
Adds a new subscription to the user subscriptions ArrayList.
addUserToExistingAccount(User) - Method in class interfaces.AccountInterface
A method to add an existing user to one of the user's existing accounts.
addUserToList(User) - Method in class atm.ATM
Adds a new user to the list of users who can use the ATM.
alertManager() - Method in class atm.Bills
Alerts the manager when the amount of any denomination of bills goes below 20.
amount - Variable in class atm.Transaction
The dollar amount of the transaction.
Asset - Class in account
Asset is a child of Account and is an abstract class for all asset accounts: Chequing, Savings, and StockAccount.
Asset(int, ATM) - Constructor for class account.Asset
Asset constructor calls on super Account.
atm - package atm
This package contains all classes which closely relate to or interact with the ATM machine.
atm - Variable in class account.Account
An instance of the ATM objectATM.
atm - Variable in class account.ReadAndWrite
Instance of ATM.
ATM - Class in atm
This class represents an ATM machine.
